review: You will need to plug in the 'stick' part if you want the best performance. The wire is a bit short so you will need to be close to an outlet.Other than that, the remote is very smooth and simple to use. Both the stick and remote are very lightweight and small, making it easy to carry with you for travel or simply move it to different rooms. Since it is a bit small, it can be easy to lose so keep it in a safe place. The actual program interface is very clean and favors Prime's material (obviously). If you want to use Netflix, you will need to access it as an 'app' along with Hulu Plus, etc.If you buy it for a friend, it will come logged in with your account, but this is easy to change. Still learning it, but overall I would definitely recommend it.
